title: Poster, 1993-53-87, ca. 1980
inscribed: Other text: "A public art event sponsored by P.A.D. (Political Art Documentation/Distribution) in Manhattan and Brooklyn / Including Posters, performances, films, graffiti and outdoor environments to protest the use of taxes for war and the economic cutbacks to the cities." [Other text includes locations in New York: 13 sites and 5 special event dates and locations] Imprinted in black ink on bottom: "For more information contact: P.A.D. c/o Seven Loaves (Lower East Side Arts Network) 605 E. 9th St. New York, N.Y. 10009 Poster sponsored by Gallery 345"
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
